    • Method Detail

      • fetchComments

        public java.util.ArrayList<ThreadModel> fetchComments(TopicFetcher.SortMethod sort)
        Fetch comments globally (so not by parent) by location/date
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        list of comments/topics

      • fetchChildComments

        public java.util.ArrayList<ThreadModel> fetchChildComments(java.util.UUID parentID,
                                                  TopicFetcher.SortMethod sort)
        Fetch comments by parent (and location/date)

        Can be used to fetch only topics (pass parentID = ThreadModel.ROOT)

        Parameters:
        parentID - UUID of parent comment
        sort - sorting method
        Returns:
        list of comments (or topics if parentID = null)
